Detailed Description

A component to be attached to a Scene or SceneObject.

Member Function Documentation

const char* rev::Component::className ( ) const
inlineoverridevirtual

The name of this class.

Every subclass should redefine/override this property to return its name

Reimplemented from rev::Object.

Reimplemented in rev::LightComponent, rev::CubeMapComponent, rev::ModelComponent, rev::ShaderComponent, rev::ListenerComponent, rev::ScriptComponent, rev::PhysicsSceneComponent, rev::StateComponent, rev::RigidBodyComponent, and rev::TransformComponent.

◆ maxAllowed()

virtual int rev::Component::maxAllowed ( ) const
inlinevirtual

Max number of allowed components per scene object.

If left at -1, there is no limit

Reimplemented in rev::CameraComponent, rev::CanvasComponent, rev::AudioSourceComponent, rev::RigidBodyComponent, rev::AudioListenerComponent, rev::ModelComponent, rev::CharControlComponent, rev::LightComponent, rev::TransformComponent, rev::BoneAnimationComponent, rev::CubeMapComponent, rev::ListenerComponent, rev::StateComponent, rev::ShaderComponent, and rev::PhysicsSceneComponent.

◆ namespaceName()

const char* rev::Component::namespaceName ( ) const
inlineoverridevirtual

The full namespace for this class.

Every subclass should redefine/override this property to return its full namespace. The built in logging methods will use this value for the message category

Reimplemented from rev::Object.
